Job Title: Android Software Development Engineer - Java Programming
Job Description: We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits. This Android app developer will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications. Must Have skills: - Minimum 2 years of experience in Android Development. - You should have experience in software engineering best practices and design principles. - You should have solid communication and collaboration skills, high spirited, eager to learn, able to perform in a high pressure environment - Very strong logical skills. - Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies - Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle Primary duties : - Developing Android apps for our products - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features - Unit-test code for robustness,usability, and general reliability - Work on bug fixing and improving application performance - Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
UG: BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, B.Sc in Any Specialization
